StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
? ITIL & ITSM Process Definition & Implementation. ? Business Analysis and Project Management. ? Software Development Methodologies i.e. Waterfall and Agile Methodologies. ? IT Service Level Agreements (SLAs) and Operating Level Agreements (OLAs.) ? Integrations & automation of processes using Workflow and Flow Designer. ? SDLC, system u gradation, integrations, development, defect resolution, governance & leadership ? Databases (MySQL, Oracle, SQL Server, etc.) ? ServiceNow platform notably CSM, ITSM, ITOM, ITAM, CSM, SecOps, GRC) etc. ? Project Portfolio Management (PPM), Application Portfolio Management (APM), IT Governance, Risk, and Compliance (GRC), Agile Development. ? Experience of configuring and administering ITSM tools like ServiceNow, HPSM, Ivanti Service Manager & ManageEngine. ? ServiceNow platform modules (Incident, Problem, Change, CMDB, Asset Management, Service Portal, etc.) ? ServiceNow integration solutions including Integration Hub, SSO, Rest services etc. ? Business Rules, Client Scripting, UI Policies, ACLs, CSS,Properties,UI pages, Workflows, Contexts etc. ? Web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, XML, SOAP, REST etc.) ? Leading SIT, UAT & Working with QA team and tracking results. ? Data Analytics. Reporting & Documentation ? Proficient in full assessments, architecture, design, planning, implementation, and roll-out in developing business cases, governance, cost-benefit analysis, and best-practice methodologies. ? Strong written communication, verbal and presentation skills for variety of audiences.
ServiceNow Specific (Skills)
Application Developer Modules/Skills: ? SecOps - Vulnerability Management, Vulnerability ? Client-side Scripting Response and Integrations ? Server-side Scripting, ? Governance, Risk and Compliance - Risk management ? Flow Designer and Virtual Agent Integrations. ? Integration HUB ? HR Service Delivery - Now Mobile, Case Management, ? Scheduled Jobs Knowledge Management and Agent Workspace ? Notifications ? CSM (Customer Service Management) ? Agent workspace / ITSM Workspace ? Integration HUB and Flow Designer ? Outbound REST/SOAP Integrations ? Many more ? Inbound REST/SOAP integrations ? UI Pages Other Technologies ? Many more CSS ServiceNow Application Solutions: HTML/XML ? ITSM - All modules Java, JavaScript, J2EE, Spring Boot ? ITOM - Cloud Management, Event Oracle/SQL Server Management, Discovery and Service Mapping Microservices ? ITAM - Integrations, HAM/SAM Cloud Computing AWS, Azure ? ITBM - Demand Management, Project Shell Scripting Portfolio Management, Agile Development and Performance Analytics.

PositionHistory.Title: Project Manager ServiceNow
PositionHistory.Description: Client: Tencent America / Legal & General America Responsibilities: ? Develop comprehensive project plans outlining scope, objectives, deliverables, timelines, and resources. Define project milestones and ensure timely completion. ? Identify and engage with all stakeholders, including clients, team members, and executives. ? Identify potential project risks and develop mitigation strategies. ? Work with clients to gather detailed requirements and understand their business needs. Translate requirements into actionable project plans and tasks. ? Manage changes to the project scope, schedule, and resources using established change management processes. ? Leverage in-depth knowledge of the ServiceNow platform to guide project implementation. Ensure best practices are followed in configuring and customizing ServiceNow solutions. ? Oversee the integration of ServiceNow with other enterprise systems and tools. Ensure seamless data flow and process alignment between integrated systems. ? Prepare cost estimates, schedule project tasks, allocate resources to team members, oversee a project assistant, and monitor projects to ensure they are completed on time and under budget. ? Engage with key stakeholders to learn about the team structure, gaps, and issues in the processes implemented in ServiceNow. Finding the core process and actions which must be automated using ServiceNow Platform.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 22% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Project Lead ServiceNow
PositionHistory.Description:
Responsibilities: ? Contributed directly to the strategy, development and quality of IT Service Management, Asset Management, Operations management and the company's service delivery capability. Owned IT Services and ensure their effective delivery, management and improvement to meet company and client needs. ? Managing product backlog, prioritization. Documenting artifacts like epic, user stories with acceptance criteria. ? Logging issues, risks, and challenges and tracking progress with Requirements Traceability Matrices (RTM). ? Documenting User Acceptance Testing (UAT) and planning release deployment in production. Preparing together with technical team on preparing user manuals and leading user trainings and providing post production support. ? Spearheaded the development of cost estimation and project scheduling processes that streamlined the planning cycle by 30% and reduced project costs by 20% ? Elicited and developed clear, traceable requirements using interviews, document analysis, requirements workshops, surveys, site visits, business process descriptions, use cases, scenarios, business analysis, tasks and workflow analysis. ? Collaborated with developers, architects, subject matter experts, and other IT team members to establish the technical vision and analyze tradeoffs between usability and performance needs. ? Worked with Technical Requirements including architecture, interfaces, security and business continuity. ? Managed End to end of project implementation and migration from Ivanti Service Manager to ServiceNow. ? Developed, executed and supervision of ServiceNow modules of CSM, ITSM, ITOM, ITAM, GRC. ? Liaised with risk management, internal audit and employee services departments to direct compliance issues to appropriate chanels for investigation and resolution. ? Managed compliance product and service reseller review program, including development of policies and procedures. ? Produced, monitored, and reported on a comprehensive set of metrics and KPIs based on the IT service deliverables using ServiceNow. ? Owned and led the execution of the process development and improvement roadmap for multiple ITIL processes to improve alignment and business outcome. ? Planning, documenting and executing detailed UAT for all projects. ? Acted as single point of contact between multiple departments and sections to understand and fulfill their business requirements and establish efficient decision support system by ensuring an centralized data platform and unification of systems and consolidation of services, processes, and resources. ? Defined KPIs for to automate the reports and dashboard for management to have clear view of business performance for the organization. ? Assisted in Integrations of ServiceNow with external and internal systems / subsystems.
Accomplishments: ? Automated the business processes. ? Handled integrations with external vendor and partner systems in order to speed up and modernize the operations and saved operational expenses for company.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 59% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Service Delivery Manager
PositionHistory.Description:
Responsibilities: ? Spearheaded the entire technical operation function of the company involving product configuration, customization, migration, deployment and integration ServiceNow. ? Allocated resources to team members and monitored progress, resulting in a 90% on-time completion rate and a 15% increase in team efficiency ? Responsible for planning and formulating effective ITIL modules by developing service strategies, design, transition, operations, and continuous improvement for aligning incident, configuration, problem, change, knowledge, and service level management in ServiceNow ? Delivered projects in ITSM products like HP Service Manager, Ivanti Service Manager and ServiceNow. ? Liaison between business and project team. Taking accountability for service delivery, meeting customer expectations, and driving future demand. ? Provided cost-effective solutions to core incidents via proper identification and resolutions while retaining CI data within asset management systems and data migrations/integrations. ? Mitigated risks and maintained an accurate record of stock/s by uploading, revising, and reconciling asset inventory in ITAM module of ServiceNow. ? Pivotal role in devising and applying KPIs, dashboards, and reports on IT services for the company's leadership team. ? Leading UAT with detailed test case documentation, training end users and engaging stakeholders in the process. ? Saved costs for the company by accomplishing all assigned projects within agreed timelines. ? Organized customer satisfaction surveys to optimize service quality. ? Timely organized meetings, escalation, played dynamic role in resolving conflicts and invited timely interference of key stakeholders.
Accomplishments: ? Capably maintained 0.5M users who used devices by streamlining asset management processes/procedures for facilitating all devices along with network devices. ? Enforced an innovative approach to improve the client's web reporting system, which effectively reduced the financial tracking analysis time by 50% ? Optimized existing systems by creating new workflows, business rules and automation using flow designer. ? Actively participated in implementation of smart learning project in UAE, one of its unique program in the region.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 60% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Senior Software Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
Responsibilities: ? Engaged in all phases of Product/Solution Development Cycle from requirement elicitation to final product deployment & support ? Led planning, scoping & timely delivery of projects using ITIL framework and ITSM tools. ? Customized and developed components and unified processes several modules with existing systems and sub- systems within organization. ? Involved in requirement gathering & analysis and documented Functional Specifications, design documents, UAT documents and engaged with development team following the agile/scrum methodology.
Accomplishments: ? Led projects which generated highest revenue for the company. ? Created reports to help management for operation visibility, audits, taking right business decisions. ? Generated revenues and expanded the business by actively participating in presales and bidding activities for RFPs.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 98% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Senior Software Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
Responsibilities: ? Leadership role with broad responsibility of overseeing design and implementation of overall integrated service fulfillment projects valuing to meet/exceed business objectives and goals. ? Major role in architecting and designing solution/s, deployment, SIT, UAT, and post-deployment solution support. Strategically planned scope and delivery of projects using Java and J2EE technologies. ? Contributed gathering and analyzing requirements, documenting functional specifications, design documents, and implementation using Agile Scrum Methodologies. Worked with QA team and testers to prepare and run UAT. ? Assisted the Presales team in all operations of RFP/RFQ study, developing proposals, solution design, and POC presentation. ? Efficiently led the Operations Support System (OSS) solution development for telecom projects which included Broadband, Voice, and IPTV services.
Accomplishments: ? Contributed in pre-sales activities in terms of study of RFP/RFQ, solution design, proposal development and POC presentation, to win major project bids. ? Designed & developed different enterprise level projects for Telco customers in Asia pacific and South Asia region, including PTCL, SingTel, GrameenPhone in Pakistan, Singapore & Bangladesh.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 59% of this job

Degree.Comments: ? M. Sc. (Computer Science), University of Sindh, Pakistan
? B. Sc. (Computer Science), University of Sindh, Pakistan

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Sultan Ahmed Khoso is experienced in the management of: Information Technology (Project Management). Sultan Ahmed Khoso has 17 years of work experience, with 8 years of management experience, including a mid-level position.
sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:ManagementStory: Current position is a low-level management role: Project Manager ServiceNow Starting on 1/1/2023, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 2 years and 10 months: Title: Project Manager ServiceNow for Softions Inc Starting on 10/1/2021, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 5 months: Title: Project Lead ServiceNow for Dubai Health Authority Starting on 9/1/2016, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 4 years and 5 months: Title: Service Delivery Manager for Ministry of Education

sov:Findings.sov:Information: [Sovren:300;] You should not use the PDF format for your resume. Due to inherent limitations with text extraction from PDFs, you are less likely to get a job when using a PDF resume.
[Sovren:212;] A phone number was not found in the contact information. A resume should always include a phone number.
[Sovren:213;] A street level address was not found in the contact information. A full contact address should always be included in a resume as it allows for location based searches.

[Sovren:112;] The following section was identified as a skills section type: 'Other Technical Skills'. Skills should not be in a separate section, but instead, each skill should be included in the descriptions of work history or education. THIS IS INCREDIBLY IMPORTANT FOR AI MATCHING ALGORITHMS

sov:ResumeUserArea.sov:ParserConfigurationString: Coverage.FindSkillsInEntireDocument = True; Coverage.IgnoreCaseForSkills = True; Coverage.PersonalAttributes = True; Coverage.Training = True; Culture.CountryCodeForUnitedKingdomIsUK = True; Culture.DefaultCountryCode = US; Culture.Language = English; Culture.PreferEnglishVersionIfTwoLanguagesInDocument = True; Data.UserDefinedParsing = False; OutputFormat.AssumeCompanyNameFromPrecedingJob = False; OutputFormat.ContactMethod.PackStyle = Split; OutputFormat.DateOutputStyle = ExplicitlyKnownDateInfoOnly; OutputFormat.NestJobsBasedOnDateRanges = True; OutputFormat.NormalizeRegions = False; OutputFormat.SimpleCustomLinkedIn = False; OutputFormat.SkillsStyle = Default; OutputFormat.StripParsedDataFromPositionHistoryDescription = True; OutputFormat.TelcomNumber.Style = Raw; OutputFormat.XmlFormat = HrXmlResume25
